About Substrata

A front-end skeleton project.

Give it a try

Download ZIPGithub Project â†’

Key Features

  • Very lightweight
  • Simple, Responsive and Semantic Grid
  • Few design styles...
  • ...just basic clean typography
  • Google Web Fonts Code
  • Analytics Code
  • Example Media Query Break Points
  • HTML5 Boilerplate .htaccess file
  • Gruntfile with watch, build and server tasks
  • Compile Jade, Less, CoffeeScript
  • Page and blog post static site generation
  • Easily extend these features or add other languages

Cobbled together by @shaunchurch. Code borrowed from Twitter Bootstrap, HTML5 Boilerplate, Semantic Grid System.
